ctx: intros H_r a b d H_div_a H_A_b.
intros H_r a b d H_div_a H_A_b.
exceptions.exn: In environment S : Set A : S -> Prop Add, Mult : S -> S -> S O, I : S Opp : S -> S H_comm_add : commutativity S Add H_intern_mult : intern S A Mult H_assoc_mult : associativity S Mult H_dist : distributivity S Add Mult b, d : S H_A_d : A d q : S H_A_a : A (Mult d q) H_a_nO : d = O -> False H_A_q : A q H_A_b : A b H : nat H0 : intern S A Add H2 : associativity S Add H4 : opposite S A Add O Opp H3 : A O H1 : forall x : S, A x -> Add O x = x H5 : forall x : S, A x -> Add x O = x Unable to unify "False" with "Mult (Mult d q) b = O \\/ (d = O -> False) /\\ (exists q0 : S, A q0 /\\ Mult (Mult d q) b = Mult d q0)".

original: intros H_r a b d H_div_a H_A_b. destruct H_r as [H_comm_add [H_is_group [H_intern_mult [H_assoc_mult H_dist]]]]. destruct H_div_a as [H_A_d [H_A_a [H_a_O | [H_a_nO [q [H_A_q H_aq]]]]]]. - subst a. simpl. left. reflexivity. - right. split. + intros H_contr. apply H_a_nO. apply (integrity H_intern_mult). rewrite Mult_m_O. apply H_contr. + exists (Mult q b). split. * apply H_intern_mult. ++ apply H_A_q. ++ apply H_A_b. * rewrite H_aq. apply H_dist. apply H_A_a. apply H_A_b.
